contextDescription: An introduction to front-end JavaScript development using jQuery for DOM manipulation, event handling, and AJAX interactions to create dynamic web pages and interfaces.
learningObjectives: Understand why jQuery is still relevant in modern web development
Select HTML elements in JavaScript vs jQuery
Create and modify DOM elements with jQuery
Listen and bind to DOM events with jQuery
Make AJAX requests to external APIs
Process JSON data from API responses
Implement dynamic content updates without page reload
Handle click events and form submissions
Manipulate CSS styles and classes with jQuery
Use event delegation for dynamic elements
Create interactive user interfaces with minimal code
Understand the advantages of jQuery over vanilla JavaScript
prerequisites: Understanding of HTML and CSS fundamentals
Experience with JavaScript functions and callbacks
Knowledge of HTTP requests and responses
